title: Self-cycled photocatalytic Fenton system and rapid degradation of organic pollutants over magnetic 3D MnS nanosheet/iron–nickel foam
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3802-3815
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00452C, Paper
Xiaoqian Ma, Yu Liu, Yi Zhao, Xiaohong Chen, Junyang Leng, Anlong Zhang, Daomei Chen, Kai Xiong, Jiaqiang Wang
The self-cycled photocatalytic Fenton system rapidly degrades organic pollutants containing real wastewater.
